node.excerpt: This is an example gallery project that will be display in our homepage's Gallery layout.  Some data for our card will be pulled from the file's frontmatter.  The excerpt of text is generated automatically by Gatsby-Tranformer-Remark when the end marker define in gatsby-config.js is reached.  Without an endmark the excerpt length is 140 charachters.
This text can be autoamtically parsed to create an excerpt for our card.  But we can also used defined start and stop exceprt tags so longâ€¦
